name: Pixaria
tag_list: digital-photography, php, mysql, web-application, pixaria, digital-asset-management, gallery
overview:
Pixaria is a Canadian software company, and a leader in Digital Asset Management with two key products - Pixaria Gallery & Asset deck.

Pixaria Gallery

Pixaria Gallery is an affordable, web based image gallery software that makes it easy to publish, distribute and sell images and image derived products through your own website. Key Functions include; integration with E-Commerce Platforms, a batch gallery editing tool, and automated image thumbnail generation.

Pixaria Asset Deck

AssetDeck is a web based digital asset management software that simplifies file sharing within any office or organization. Key functions include; a variety of industry standard file formats, automatic IPTC/XMP metdata import, and user group based access control.

Pixaria’s objective is to simplify the image gallery environment. It provides streamlined services that help professional photographers and digital image librarians publish and sell their work online. Pixaria is used worldwide by multinational organizations, businesses and individuals from creative agencies to events and sports publishing companies.
